issue.title: Inject sensor plugin in an existing sensor tag

content.raw: Here is an idea that doesn't solve the underlying issue, but could work for you. Can you load both the YARP and ROS plugins? Assuming that your use of ROS and YARP do not overlap, then only one plugin would effectively be active. There is potentially a performance hit.
content.html: Here is an idea that doesn't solve the underlying issue, but could work for you. Can you load both the YARP and ROS plugins? Assuming that your use of ROS and YARP do not overlap, then only one plugin would effectively be active. There is potentially a performance hit.
